title: The Little White Book
description: In 1973, Ben Klassen launched his organization, the Church of the Creator (today called Creativity) with the publication of his first book, Nature's Eternal Religion. Starting out as a one-man mail order operation, Klassen built up a following which later spanned the world. His religion, a white racial worldview, seeks to replace Christianity as the dominant religion of the Western world. This book is his church's catechism, a summary or exposition of the doctrine of Creativity. Contains "What We Believe"; "The Five Fundamental Beliefs of Creativity"; "The Essence of a Creator"; "Three Short Rules for Maintaining Excellent Health"; "Creativity: Creed and Program"; "We are Proud to be White Racial Loyalists"; "Books of Creativity" and much more
